description.value:
You add two of the following powers to your spellbook.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.tLqVc2FPuMabg0Iv]{Hold Monster}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.CdpK48ozStaZ9kIv]{Mirror Sphere}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.CQEhiy5JdXDYSVIo]{Twisting Lightning}
